entry.title: A Tether in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: ReadNowSleepLater

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,511Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 88

Summary: Stiles Stilinski never meant to become a myth. After the fall of his pack and the fading of Beacon Hills’ magic, he runs – straight into a world older, darker, and far more complicated than he ever imagined. Mystic Falls is supposed to be a quiet place to start over, to ground himself again. Instead, it becomes the center of a storm he didn’t know was waiting for him. Drawn into the tangled lives of the Mikaelsons, Stiles finds unexpected warmth among immortals who should’ve terrified him – and something dangerously close to belonging. Between Elijah’s steady grace, Kol’s mischief, Klaus’ possessive charm, and Peter’s return from the shadows, he starts to build something new: a family stitched together by chaos, magic, and a kind of love that defies logic. But magic never lets go without a fight, and neither do old bonds. When ghosts from his past and creatures from the dark rise to claim him, Stiles has to face what it truly means to be an anchor – and what, and who, he’s willing to tether himself to. Because in the end, even in the dark, someone always reaches back.

entry.title: You’re Safe, I’m Here
entry.summary:
Author: Joy_peace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,060Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 14

Summary: The Beacon Hills Preserve had always been quiet in the early evenings, the kind of quiet that hummed in the bones of anyone supernatural. Most people would call it peaceful. Liam Dunbar called it suspicious. He walked a few steps ahead, his eyes flicking between the trees, inhaling like he expected to catch a threat in the damp leaves or the wind. His shoulders were coiled tight—too tight for a patrol that was supposed to be routine. The sun hovered low enough to stain the whole forest with orange and copper. Behind him, Theo Raeken let out a slow, theatrical sigh. “Dunbar,” he said, voice low but full of a patience he very smugly claimed he didn’t have, “you’re clenching your jaw so hard I can hear your molars trying to fuse.”

entry.title: I Wanna Be Yours
entry.summary:
Author: Taintedtricked

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,598Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 40

Summary: Stiles never meant to fall for Derek Hale — the brooding, half-feral werewolf who grunts more than he talks and looks at him like he’s both a headache and a heartbeat. But somewhere between burnt coffee, pack crises, and late nights spent patching each other up, Stiles realizes he doesn’t just want to be in Derek’s orbit — he wants to be his. Derek’s spent his life building walls so no one can get close enough to hurt him again. But Stiles is persistent, sunlight in human form, and Derek’s starting to wonder if maybe it’s okay to want warmth. Secrets held too long begin to unravel, and somewhere between the noise and the silence, they find it — the quiet truth neither of them can ignore. “Maybe I just wanna be yours.” A slow-burn Sterek story inspired by I Wanna Be Yours by Arctic Monkeys — all coffee, comfort, and confessions you never meant to say out loud.

entry.title: 'cause being your punchline still is something
entry.summary:
Author: whiry

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,681Chapters: 9/21Kudos: 133

Summary: Born into a world of the supernatural and forced to segregate himself and his human peers from the supernatural creatures that inhabit Beacon Hills, Stiles grew up with the belief that integration was the key to a better life, thanks to his mother’s social work. Of course, that belief is only furthered by the mate mark he bears of his mate’s first words to him, something only supernatural creatures and their occasional human mates are supposed to have. Desperate to find his mate and carry on his mother’s work after her death, Stiles does everything in his power to unite his town, even if that means enduring dinners with Derek Hale, who hates him and refuses to speak to him. After a terse interaction, Derek finally speaks and the two realize they’re mates. Well, surely Stiles can still get his happy ending. Right?

Summary: In which Derek Hale, a young erotic novelist, takes a wrong turn one night, and accidentally scares a stranger in a dark alley—Stiles Stilinski, a deaf person who does everything he can to pretend his world hasn’t gone quiet. Their rocky first meeting turns into borrowed books, shared tea, and unexpected comfort as Stiles slips into Derek’s life with sharp eyes, stubborn warmth, and a presence Derek didn’t know he was missing. entry.title: LIKE A WOLF HOWLING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,855Chapters: 8/37Kudos: 1

Summary: Twelve years after Adda's rampage, a now adult Eli Hale, along with Boyd and Erica's twin daughters, is working as a supernatural contractor; traveling the US and helping people out with problems of an occult nature. When the spirits of The Grey become frightened, and a powerful hunter targets the three, Eli must return home to Beacon Hills and gather the Hale Pack to once more defend their home. A mysterious and powerful hunter, a solo artist, travels the nation in an effort to destroy the supernatural threat to humanity. When she rescues an orphaned werewolf child, the delicate threads holding her paradigm together begin to unravel. Who is this child, really? Why is she so convinced that something bigger is at play here? And why, when she follows a target to Beacon Hills, do the streets seem so familiar? Or; The Parking lot is mostly empty. The neon sign which reads VACANCIES is buzzing, loud. In the car, Amanda and Ali say something back and forth, then look at you, and then speak again. You think that they resent you for dragging them out here, yet they won't leave.

entry.title: Of Soft Hoodies and Misunderstandings
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,244Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 339

Summary: Stiles, lacrosse captain and all around basket case, knows of Derek Hale. Star basketball player, frat bro, too hot for his own good college sophomore. Stiles thinks his car is stupid and his face is stupid and he might be more than a little in love with him.Too bad he'll never talk to the man, because Stiles doesn't have time for frat boy bullshit and toxic masculinity.If only Stiles knew how wrong he was.(For Meagan who let me rant about this for hours when she made ONE singular comment about frat boy Derek)
